name: Sky Development
description: A real estate firm based in Florida
overview:
Sky Development – Building the Future, Today

Top real estate and investment firm, Sky Development is based in Miami and was one of the first companies to invest in the development and construction of mixed-use or multi-use complexes in Florida. Founded in 2006, Sky Development is the brainchild of entrepreneur and real estate developer Yizhak Toledano. Carrying the lessons and principles instilled in Yizhak as a young man growing up in Israel has been the foundation upon which this dynamic and innovative company is based.

Sky Development – Team Work and Leadership

The success of Sky Development is in the core philosophy of the company. Each member of the team is fully invested in the success of the company and is passionate about the real estate development sector and the role that they play in it. Sky Development harnesses the skills and talents of people across diverse sectors: architecture, construction, finance, design and development. It’s a close-knit team led by one a visionary entrepreneur.

Sky Development started small; two small-scale apartment

building renovations in Miami, but their success and vision led the company to pursue its founding dream – the development, construction and successful sale of multi-use buildings and complexes for Florida families and businesses. The complexes comprise residential units, office space, commercial and retail buildings. The developments were an immediate success and continue to be few of the most groundbreaking and innovative developments in Florida. Sky Development – Bringing Florida Families Home From the ultra-luxurious villas and homes at ‘Villaggio on the Lakes’, with 223 manor homes and a fully equipped business and leisure center, to the striking design of the ‘Bay Towers’, ideally located on the Space Coast, close to Cape Canaveral and directly opposite the Kennedy Space Center. Sky Development is one of the few premier real estate development companies in Florida that believes in complete market assessment, years before any ground is broken on a new development or building. Every aspect of the assessment is evaluated by a team of independent assessors to consolidate and ensure the success of each project. This sort of pre-planning has played an important role in establishing Sky Development as a market leader and a well-known resource on real estate investment in Florida. The company has a division devoted to asset management and often acts as a third-party advisor for other real estate developers in the state.

Expansion across America – Sky Development in Nevada

Sky Development has recently completed ‘The Residence at Canyon Gate’ in Las Vegas, Nevada. This is the ultimate in residential living and offers investors and families the chance to experience resort style living in a secure environment with the modern conveniences and entertainment facilities. Sky Development is continually looking at opportunities across the country to expand and innovate in the residential and commercial real estate sector.
